title: Can you still send a drawing to Riot?
body: I need 7 RP for a skin and I heard you used to be able to send a drawing for a bit of RP and was wondering if this was still possible!

replies.body: We'll certainly help where we can, ElasticRoses!  If you'd like to draw us a drawing you can post it here and or in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and maybe we can work something out!  If you're looking for some inspiration, I think poros are cute! :D

Yes, people still do this! You can either make a ticket or post it here, and I'm sure someone will fix you up. This is limited to small amounts of RP, and I'm sure they would gladly top you up with 7 RP for your art.
What exactly is a ticket, if you don't mind me asking?

A [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) is a request that you send directly to the support group. If you're unsure of what topic to select, many others have posted their pictures in this forum section too.
